mapper.sql: ID, DETAIL_ID, CARD_NO, MER_NO, TERM_NO, TIMEZONE, FEE, MER_NAME, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_DATE, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_AMT, MERCHANT_EMAIL, IS_SEND_BILLDETAIL,START_STL_DATE,END_STL_DATE,FMRCH_NO
mapper.select:
select
example.distinct
from VIEW_STLBOOK_DETAIL
order by ${example.orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into VIEW_STLBOOK_DETAIL
ID,
DETAIL_ID,
CARD_NO,
MER_NO,
TERM_NO,
TIMEZONE,
FEE,
MER_NAME,
TRAN_TYPE,
TRAN_DATE,
TRAN_TIME,
TRAN_AMT,

mapper.update:
update VIEW_STLBOOK_DETAIL
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_ID = #{record.detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NO = #{record.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERM_NO = #{record.termNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMEZONE = #{record.timezone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MER_NAME = #{record.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_TYPE = #{record.tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_DATE = #{record.tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_TIME = #{record.tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_AMT = #{record.tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update VIEW_STLBOOK_DETAIL set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_ID = #{record.detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NO = #{record.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERM_NO = #{record.termNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMEZONE = #{record.timezone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MER_NAME = #{record.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_TYPE = #{record.tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_DATE = #{record.tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_TIME = #{record.tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_AMT = #{record.tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select to_char(sum(tran_amt), 'fm999999999999990.90') || '#' || to_char(sum(fee), 'fm999999999999990.90') as fee from view_stlbook_detail where id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM( select
example.distinct
from (SELECT T4.ID ID, TO_CHAR(T6.ID) DETAIL_ID, T6.CARDNUMBER CARD_NO, T6.MERCHANTNUMBER MER_NO, T6.TERMINALNUMBER TERM_NO, T6.PERFEE FEE, t6.fee_order TIMEZONE, T4.MER_NAME MER_NAME, T6.TRANSACTIONTYPE TRAN_TYPE, T6.TRANSACTIONDATE TRAN_DATE, T6.TRANSACTIONTIME TRAN_TIME, T6.TRANSACTIONMONEY TRAN_AMT FROM T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK_T T4, T_CLEAR_MERCLEAR_BOOK T5, T_TRANSACTION_RECORDS_HIS_T T6 WHERE T4.ID = T5.STL_BOOK_ID AND T5.ID = T6.CLEARBOOK_ID)
order by ${example.orderByClause} ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${endResult} ) WHERE rn > ${startResult}

select to_char(sum(tran_amt), 'fm999999999999990.90') || '#' || to_char(sum(fee), 'fm999999999999990.90') as fee from (SELECT T4.ID ID, TO_CHAR(T6.ID) DETAIL_ID, T6.CARDNUMBER CARD_NO, T6.MERCHANTNUMBER MER_NO, T6.TERMINALNUMBER TERM_NO, T6.PERFEE FEE, t6.fee_order TIMEZONE, T4.MER_NAME MER_NAME, T6.TRANSACTIONTYPE TRAN_TYPE, T6.TRANSACTIONDATE TRAN_DATE, T6.TRANSACTIONTIME TRAN_TIME, T6.TRANSACTIONMONEY TRAN_AMT FROM T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK_T T4, T_CLEAR_MERCLEAR_BOOK T5, T_TRANSACTION_RECORDS_HIS_T T6 WHERE T4.ID = T5.STL_BOOK_ID AND T5.ID = T6.CLEARBOOK_ID) where id = #{id}
